description: A group of twenty doctors in Drum Kingdom who were captured and forced into servitude during Wapol's Doctor Hunt. These physicians were imprisoned in Drum Castle and made to serve exclusively the royal family and nobility, leaving ordinary citizens without medical care. Despite their captivity, they continued perfecting their medical skills.

keyMoments.title: Isshi-20 Formation During Doctor Hunt
keyMoments.description: The episode reveals that Wapol captured the kingdom's doctors and forced them to serve only him at the castle, creating the Isshi-20.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the oppressive medical situation in Drum Kingdom and explains why citizens had no access to doctors.

structure.purpose: Serve exclusively the royal family and nobility of Drum Kingdom

goals.goal: Perfect medical skills while in captivity
goals.description: Despite being imprisoned, the doctors continued to advance their medical knowledge for the betterment of the people.

statusHistory.description: Group is imprisoned in Drum Castle serving Wapol

context.formation: Created during the Doctor Hunt when Wapol ordered the capture of all doctors in Drum Kingdom
context.purpose: Wapol's strategy to control the population by monopolizing medical care
context.resistance: Only two doctors escaped the hunt: Dr. Hiriluk and Dr. Kureha
context.laterDevelopment: After Wapol's defeat, the Isshi-20 would later expand to become the Isshi-100
